item.description:
Please join us for a fun, educational and tasty time at the Topsfield Strawberry Festival! The theme this year is Farming in Essex County.

Small, local farms are a true treasure in our communities. You'll have a chance to talk with growers from Appleton Farms, Green Meadows Farm and Valley View Farm along with others. You'll also get to meet young cows, goats and sheep. I'll be chatting with people about home scale permaculture and showing off Heidi and Goldilocks...two of my backyard hens.
item.name: Topsfield Strawberry Festival
